attributes.additional_details:
Would like to see Government step in and ban the Just-Eat adverts. Their current slogan, "Don't Cook, Just Eat" and associated adverts are a blatant encouragement of unhealthy eating.

Presently there are very real and current issues regarding health problems, money issues and a lack of basic culinary skills.

Please take down these adverts and replace them to promote healthier, more intelligent and informative lifestyles.
